title: Bolognese with tagliatelle
description: James' bolognese is a cinch to make - just let it bubble away for a rich sauce that's sure to please. If you're short of time, fresh tagliatelle is available in most large supermarkets.For this recipe you will need a pasta machine with a tagliatelle cutter.
ingredients: 3-4 medium free-range eggs (preferably with bright yellow yolks)
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
